remarks: Two intersecting lines intersect at an atom.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-2012.)
statement:
2llnmat.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
2llnmat.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
2llnmat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
2llnmat.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
2llnmat $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. N /\ Y e. N ) /\ ( X =/= Y /\ ( X ./\ Y ) =/= .0. ) ) -> ( X ./\ Y ) e. A ) $.
